prod.desciption:
Jordan Brand paid homage to an old ad campaign classic by releasing the Jordan 6 Retro Hare, now available on StockX. The Hare colorway originally made its debut on an Air Jordan 7 in one of the first Jordan ads that featured Bugs Bunny. Jumpman keeps the tradition alive by transferring this iconic colorway to a new silhouette.

This Jordan 6 consists of a white leather upper with grey underlays and a red detailing. A translucent tongue, patterned outsole, and a purple Jumpman on the heel complete the design. These sneakers released in April of 2020 and retailed for $190.
